## Markdown for Customer Churn Analysis 


#### Loading Data and Packages
```{r}
library(readr)
WA_Fn_UseC_Telco_Customer_Churn <- read_csv("~/Customer-Churn-Analysis/WA_Fn-UseC_-Telco-Customer-Churn.csv")
View(WA_Fn_UseC_Telco_Customer_Churn)

#loading packages
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)

#creating a dataframe object called telco
telco <- data.frame(WA_Fn_UseC_Telco_Customer_Churn)
glimpse(telco)
```


#### Exploring Data

``` {r}
posn.jd <- position_jitterdodge(0.5, 0, 0.6)

ggplot(telco,aes(x=PaymentMethod,col=contract)) +
geom_dotplot(position=posn.jd, aplha=0.6)

payment_plot <- ggplot(telco,aes(x=PaymentMethod,fill=Churn, order=Churn))+
  geom_bar(position="Fill")+
  facet_grid(.~ Contract)

payment_plot

```
